summary: Life story of a woman born in poverty trying to succeed. Through her many schemes, she faces her ups and downs in a cyclical nature, fueled mostly by self-interest.
cast: Emiko Aizawa|Setsuko Amamiya|Tomio Aoki|Tomoko Aoyagi|Emiko Azuma|Hyôe Enoki|Kazuko Fujii|Makiko Fujisawa|Makiko Fukamachi|Masumi Harukawa|Yûzô Harumi|Sachiko Hidari|Jôji Hidehara|Daisaburô Hirata|Jirô Hiratsuka|Kayoko Honoo|Akiko Hoshii|Keiko Kanô|Takeshi Katô|Michie Kawaguchi|Seizaburô Kawazu|Kyôko Kinukawa|Teruko Kishi|Tanie Kitabayashi|Keiko Kitaide|Kazuo Kitamura|Asao Koike|Tomiko Kudô|Akira Kume|Masakazu Kuwayama|Hiroshi Midorikawa|Gen Mihama|Tokuhei Miyahara|Naoko Miyazawa|Midori Mori|Masumi Motegi|Hiroyuki Nagato|Tsugio Nakayama|Yoshiyuki Nemoto|Kunio Niitsu|Shôichi Ozawa|Tomoko Sagawa|Yoshikazu Saitô|Kôichirô Sakai|Sumie Sasaki|Shinzô Shibata|Hitomi Shimizu|Tôru Sumikawa|Masuyo Suzumura|Eiko Takada|Toshio Takahara|Hiroshi Takao|Chigusa Takayama|Harumi Tanaka|Taiji Tonoyama|Yoshio Tsuchida|Shigeru Tsuyuguchi|Masako Urushizawa|Masahiko Uzawa|Megumi Wakaba|Setsuko Watanabe|Toshiko Yabuki|Sakutarô Yamakawa|Jitsuko Yoshimura|Takashi Ôkawa|Setsumi Ôkura
title: La mujer insecto
